segments.text: All right . If you need any help , just let me know . My name is Greg .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , I'll let you know if I need anything . Hm , this mattress is very firm . Jack will probably like it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Did you find something you like ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , this mattress is very good . It's pretty firm . The mattress I â€™ m now sleeping on is saggy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You are right . This is very good brand . It doesn't sag easily and we offer a lifetime warranty , so you don't have to worry about its quality .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Does it come with a frame ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Unfortunately , it doesn't . However we can give you a 10 % discount on the frame . We also offer a very good financing plan . There is no payment no interest until next June .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's an attractive plan . I'll think about it .
segments.speaker: S2
